sections.heading: Appeals; manner.Appellate review under this code shall be governed by section 30-1601
sections.text: SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, ยง 17, UPC ยง 1-308.AnnotationsAppeals of matters arising under the Nebraska Probate Code are reviewed for error on the record. In re Conservatorship of Estate of Martin, 228 Neb. 103, 421 N.
